items.description: OpenTripPlanner itinerary, augmented with leg bookings per leg

allOf.description: A place, as a location-name pair
Geographic latitude-longitude object in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lat.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lon.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

allOf.description: A place, as a location-name pair
Geographic latitude-longitude object in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lat.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lon.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

anyOf.description: A mode that involves using your personal vehicle or legs
A mode that involves transit with fixed schedules
A mode that is available on-demand for your personal use

departureDelay.description: duration in milliseconds (negative values permitted), https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_time

arrivalDelay.description: duration in milliseconds (negative values permitted), https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_time

fare.description: A fare/price as billed from the user in POINTs

product.description: Temporary way to define what kind of product has been purchased to get a ticket/booking. Will be replaced something more sophisticated once proper product system will be development.

type.description: A type of ticket/product that this booking is valid for - should be unique within a given region, e.g. 'Single ticket / Lähiseutu 2'. When reusing the tickets in maas-backend, the 'type' field is checked for equality.

id.description: Id of the product retrived from Database

mode.description: A mode that only involves waiting in the current location
A mode that involves changing transports

items.description: Booking option for an itinerary, is either an existing booking pointer or a new booking instruction
